;Recently, a piece of news about "writers' exams" has attracted attention. In 2023, Fangcao Magazine, a public institution affiliated with the Wuhan Federation of Literary and Art Circles, announced a special recruitment list, including young writers Ban Yu, Chen Chuncheng, Wang Suxin, and Dan Bao (Liu Xueting). This incident once again caused netizens to lament that "the end of the universe is the exam editor". The public list shows that Ban Yu, Chen Chuncheng and Wang Suxin "successfully landed", while Dan Bao unfortunately lost his name to Sun Shan.

;

;Although the topic of this news is not as popular as last year's "Celebrity Editorial Examination" incident, it also raises some issues worthy of in-depth discussion. The reason why this "writer test" has aroused heated discussions is because there are problems with the character design and selection, which caused a strong sense of violation to the outside world. This point deserves special analysis.

;

;Ban Yu was once known as one of the "Three Heroes of the Northeastern Renaissance". He is the author of the novel collection "Winter Swimming" and the literary planner of the suspense drama "The Long Season". A major theme of this hit drama, which is set against the backdrop of the layoff wave in Northeast China at the end of the last century, is the reflection on the "iron rice bowl", especially its restraint and alienation of people.

;

;Danbao has a background in sociology and anthropology. Her literary works focus on gender and class issues, and she also specializes in non-fiction writing. She has long been shown to be "concerned with reality", which is consistent with how she looks at it. "Preparation" has nothing to do with it.

;

;No wonder some netizens commented that when they saw this news about "Writer's Examination for Editorial Examination", they felt like "Sun Wukong passed the exam for editorship in the Heavenly Palace" and "Winter Swimming" was finally released. Among them, Danbao also liked The Internet nickname "Shen Gongbao" was mentioned. There is no other reason than that the writer's previous works and "personality" are in great contrast with the editor's behavior, which makes readers feel inconsistent. Contrasting Danbao's statement in an interview that "how a person writes is how he lives", the short four words "writer's test" have made "how to write" and "how to live" contradict each other.

;

;If the writer himself is completely invisible outside the work and does not expect readers to understand him "like an old hen after eating eggs", then the "writer's examination" will not cause such a big stir Controversy, such as those writers who live in reclusion, rarely appear in public and do not engage in marketing. The problem is that today's cultural world has become highly marketized. In addition to literary works, young writers also sell "personalities" constructed through various online and offline interviews, speeches, meetings, and sharing sessions. This distinctive "Personal IP" is sold as a cultural commodity.

;

;Of the young writers who took the exam this time, they are more or less operating market-oriented characters. This kind of characters has also helped them achieve the success of their works, and even have other works besides their works. Success, readers who spend money to buy books will not only buy the works of writers, but also the "persona" of their marketing packaging, as well as the values ​​and lifestyles contained in them. Readers expect them to live up to their personas and are appropriately disappointed when they fail to live up to their words and deeds.

;

;To be fair, there is no law or regulation that prohibits these young writers from taking exams. Of course, a free and open modern society also allows a person to practice his values ​​​​and lifestyle, but their "glorious turn" also It's a bit "out of the blue", and naturally it's inevitable for the outside world and even followers to question: Why do they want to take the exam? What can compilation bring to these young writers who have achieved considerable success?

;

;Public information shows that Wuhan Institute of Literary and Art Theory (Fangcao Magazine) is a secondary public institution affiliated to Wuhan Federation of Literary and Art Circles. Its business scope mainly includes various literary academic research, editing, publishing and distribution of "Fangcao Magazine" 》Literary Journal. The recruitment conditions announced on the official website show that in addition to being under 40 years old, applicants also need to meet "one of three conditions": the work has won a provincial journal literary award, and has been published in a Chinese core journal or a publishing house at or above the provincial level. He has published works of more than 300,000 words, and his works have been shortlisted for several specific literary rankings.

;

;The recruitment requirements for this preparation examination are quite high. The three requirements will probably eliminate the vast majority of "ordinary question-answers". According to the published score sheet and admission list, this "entry examination" is divided into two categories: professional ability review and interview results. The final ranking is based on comprehensive performance. There is no written test. It can be seen that it is different from the ordinary "public examination". "Examination and Editing" can be said to be tailor-made for the group of "young writers". I would like to ask, why does a literary journal have such high recruitment requirements, and why can it attract many young writers to apply?

;

;These young writers have already achieved success in the market, and there is no urgent need to escape competition to "eat the royal food." Engaging in literary theory or editing work in institutional journals is somewhat overqualified. Therefore, a more reasonable inference is that the benefit brought by compilation is not the apparent "iron rice bowl", but that it can provide these market-oriented writers with a better social status, or some kind of identity mark. The reason why young writers ask for Having an official position and a half-job position can probably take advantage of both sides. This is naturally in line with the decision-making of a "rational economic man".

;

;"Academies hate geniuses just like monasteries hate saints" has long been a consensus in the industry. Literary works should be left to the judgment of the market and the choice of readers. It is not necessary for the writer to obtain a certain "seal of certification" or have an official position in order for his works to be popular in the world. The ridicule suffered by several young writers also illustrates this point.

;On November 10, 2023, the Jinan Intermediate People’s Court of Shandong Province publicly sentenced Sun Deshun, the former president of CITIC Bank, for accepting bribes. In this case, the defendant Sun Deshun was sentenced to death for accepting bribes, with a two-year suspended execution, deprived of political rights for life, and all personal property confiscated. After the two-year suspended execution of his death penalty was commuted to life imprisonment in accordance with the law, he was sentenced to life imprisonment without commutation or commutation. Parole; the proceeds from Sun Deshun's crime of accepting bribes and their interest will be recovered in accordance with the law and turned over to the state treasury.

;

;;;

;After trial, it was found that from 2003 to 2019, the defendant Sun Deshun successively used his positions as deputy president of the Beijing Branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, president of the Beijing Branch of the Bank of Communications, and deputy president and president of China CITIC Bank. With the convenience of providing assistance to relevant enterprises in obtaining loans and other matters, they illegally received property equivalent to more than RMB 979.5 million.

;

;Jinan Intermediate People’s Court held that defendant Sun Deshun’s behavior constituted the crime of accepting bribes. The amount of bribes Sun Deshun accepted was particularly huge, the circumstances of the crime were particularly serious, the social impact was particularly bad, and the interests of the country and the people suffered particularly heavy losses. He should be sentenced to death if found guilty. In view of the fact that Sun Deshun truthfully confessed his crime after returning to the case, confessed and repented, and actively returned the stolen goods. All the property obtained from bribery and its interest have been seized and brought to the case. There are statutory and discretionary circumstances for lenient punishment. He was sentenced to death, but it may not be executed immediately. At the same time, based on the facts and circumstances of Sun Deshun's crime, it was decided that after the two-year suspension of his death penalty was commuted to life imprisonment in accordance with the law, he would be imprisoned for life without commutation or parole. The court then made the above judgment.

(Screenshot/picture from Henan Satellite TV)" src="http://images.infzm.com/cms/medias/image/23 /11/10/62eee4c512.png" border="0" width="1080" height="595" data-src="//images.infzm.com/cms/medias/image/23/11/10/62eee4c512 .png" data-key="257803">;

;

;On November 7, 2023, Sun Meijun, deputy secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee, visited Lankao County . (Screenshots/pictures from Henan TV)

;

;On November 4, 2023, the Henan Daily client reported that the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China approved Sun Meijun to be appointed deputy secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee. Previously, she served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee and Minister of the Organization Department.

;

;After Sun Meijun took office, one more female deputy secretary of the provincial party committee was added, bringing the number to 6. The other five are Shen Ying, deputy secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee. , Deputy Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Party Committee Cheng Lihua, Deputy Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee Wu Zhongqiong, Deputy Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee Wu Haiying, and Deputy Secretary of the Sichuan Provincial Party Committee Shi Xiaolin.

;

;Among them, Wu Zhongqiong concurrently serves as Secretary of the Ganzhou Municipal Party Committee, Wu Haiying concurrently serves as Director of the United Front Work Department of the Jilin Provincial Committee and Deputy Secretary of the Provincial CPPCC Party Group, and Shi Xiaolin concurrently serves as Secretary of the Chengdu Municipal Committee.

;

;;Deputy Secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee has been vacant;;5;;months;;

;Sun Meijun is 58 years old and is from Kaijiang, Sichuan. She has been working in the central government for a long time. Since 1986, he has worked in the National Bureau of Statistics, the Research Office of the State Council, the Office of the Food Safety Commission of the State Council, the State Food and Drug Administration, and the State Administration for Market Regulation. He served as deputy director of the State Food and Drug Administration and deputy director of the State Administration for Market Regulation. In December 2020, Sun Meijun went to the local government and served successively as a member of the Standing Committee of the Beijing Municipal Party Committee, Minister of the United Front Work Department, and Minister of the Organization Department until she took up her new post.

;

;Before Sun Meijun took office, the deputy secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee had been vacant for 5 months.

;

;In June 2023, Zhou Ji, then deputy secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee and secretary of the Political and Legal Committee of the Provincial Party Committee, was promoted to deputy director of the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the Central Committee in charge of daily work and Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office of the State Council. The deputy director (at the ministerial level) in charge of daily work. Since then, the position of full-time deputy secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee has been vacant.

;

;The Fourth Plenary Session of the 16th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China held in September 2004 required that "the number of deputy secretaries of local party committees must be reduced, the standing committee shall divide responsibilities, and give full play to the collective leadership role”. During the centralized re-election of party committees at all levels across the country that began in 2006, most local party committees across the country have established a leadership team structure of "one chief and two deputy". The "Regulations on the Work of Local Committees of the Communist Party of China" issued in December 2015 officially adopted "one chief and two deputies" as the leadership composition model of local party committees. However, the regulations also make it clear that if individual ethnic autonomous areas need to appropriately increase the number of deputy secretaries, it shall be decided by the Party Central Committee or approved by the provincial party committee in accordance with the spirit of the central government.

;

;For most of the time since then, except for the two autonomous regions of Xinjiang and Tibet, which have a team structure of "one chief and four deputy", other provinces have had "one chief and two deputy". That is, one party committee secretary and two party committee deputy secretaries. Of the two deputy secretaries, one also serves as the administrative head of the provincial government, and the other is a full-time deputy secretary.

;

;The "Regulations on the Work of Local Committees of the Communist Party of China" clearly defines the responsibilities of the deputy secretary of the provincial party committee: the deputy secretary of the party committee who holds the official position of the government presides over the overall work of the government, organizes Government party group activities; deputy secretaries of the party committee who do not hold government positions mainly assist the secretary in party building work, and can also coordinate and be responsible for other aspects of work as needed.

;

;It is worth noting that Article 8 of the "Regulations on the Work of Local Committees of the Communist Party of China" stipulates that the number of standing committee members at the provincial level is 11 to 13. After Sun Meijun took office, there are 11 members of the Standing Committee of the Henan Provincial Party Committee, but the Secretary of the Provincial Discipline Inspection Commission will be vacant from September 2023, and the Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee of the Provincial Party Committee will be vacant from June 2023.

;

;;5;;People have worked in national ministries;

;

;The day before Sun Meijun was announced as deputy secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee, on November 3, 2023, Shen Ying was appointed deputy secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee.

;

;Shen Ying and Sun Meijun are the same age, and were also born in 1965. Among the six female full-time deputy secretaries of the provincial party committee, the youngest is Shi Xiaolin, born in 1969.

;

;From the perspective of employment experience, 5 of the 6 people have worked in central departments, namely Sun Meijun, Shen Ying, Wu Haiying, Cheng Lihua, and Wu Zhongqiong, all Have experience in ministry work.

;

;Shen Ying is a native of Luoshan, Henan. She graduated from Peking University with a bachelor's degree and a master's degree. She has worked in a publishing house directly under the Ministry of Finance, the State-owned Assets Administration, and the Ministry of Finance. He worked in the Department of Statistics and Evaluation of the Ministry of Finance and other departments, and became deputy director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council. He "airborne" to Heilongjiang Province in December 2018, and successively served as deputy governor, member of the Standing Committee of the Provincial Party Committee, and Minister of Organization, until this time he was transferred to deputy secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee.

;

;Wu Haiying is a native of Yiwu, Zhejiang. She has served in the Beijing District Party Committee of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, the Central State Organs Working Committee, the Party Committee of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, and the National Supervision Commission of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection in the Ecological Environment The Ministry of Finance, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the State Supervisory Commission are stationed in the State Administration of Taxation and other departments. She once served as the Standing Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, the leader of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Team of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection in the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the leader of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Team of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and National Supervision in the State Administration of Taxation. In May 2022, Wu Haiying began to local work.

;

;Cheng Lihua also worked in central ministries. She entered the Qinghai Provincial Department of Finance in 1984. In 2013, she was promoted from the director of the Qinghai Provincial Department of Finance to the deputy governor of Qinghai Province. Later, she was transferred across provinces to the Standing Committee of the Tianjin Municipal Committee. In 2018, she was appointed as the deputy minister of finance. She will be transferred in April 2021. Deputy Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Party Committee and a member of the 20th Central Committee.

;

;Wu Zhongqiong has worked for 22 years in China International Engineering Consulting Corporation, the Commission of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, and the State Administration of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense. During the exchange of local cadres, he went to Liaoning Province to serve as director of the Science and Technology Department, and later served as mayor of Anshan City and director of the Liaoning Provincial Development and Reform Commission. In January 2018, Wu Zhongqiong was promoted across provinces to the deputy governor of Jiangxi Province. Since then, he has served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee and the secretary of the Ganzhou Municipal Committee. In November 2022, after Wu Zhongqiong was appointed as the deputy secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee, he will continue to serve concurrently as the secretary of the Ganzhou Municipal Committee.

;

;Shi Xiaolin has rich local work experience. She is from Yuyao, Zhejiang Province, and has worked in Shanghai for a long time. She once served as director of the Shanghai Civil Affairs Bureau and secretary of the Shanghai Putuo District Party Committee. In May 2017, Shi Xiaolin was promoted to a member of the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee and concurrently served as Minister of the United Front Work Department. At that time, she was the only woman on the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal Committee. In May 2018, Shi Xiaolin had her first inter-provincial exchange and served as member of the Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee and Minister of the Propaganda Department. In August 2021, Shi Xiaolin was once again transferred across provinces to Sichuan, where she served as member of the Standing Committee of the Sichuan Provincial Party Committee and Secretary of the Chengdu Municipal Party Committee. In July 2023, she was appointed Deputy Secretary of the Sichuan Provincial Party Committee.

;

;In the provincial standing committee, there are also two female deputy secretaries who serve as administrative heads, namely Wang Lixia, deputy secretary of the Party Committee of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region and chairman of the autonomous region, and Wang Lixia, deputy secretary of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Party Committee and chairman of the autonomous region. Deputy Secretary of the CPC Committee and Governor Liang Huiling.

;

;;Personnel Trends;

;

;;[Central Taiwan Affairs Office Welcome a new deputy director];

;

;Updated information in the "Office Leaders" column of the official website of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council shows that Qiu Kaiming has taken up the post. Deputy Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the CPC Central Committee.

;

;Public information shows that Qiu Kaiming was born in October 1964 and has a doctorate in law. He previously served as director of the Cross-Strait Relations Research Center and director of the Research Bureau of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. position. Currently, the Taiwan Affairs Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council have one director and three deputy directors.

;

;;[Many leaders from the Central Financial Office and the Central Financial Working Committee appeared];

;

;After the Central Financial Work Conference was held, a number of leaders from the Office of the Central Financial Commission (referred to as the "Central Financial Office") and the Central Financial Working Committee (referred to as the "Central Financial Working Committee") have appeared one after another.

;

;A report published by the "Financial Times" under the supervision of the People's Bank of China on November 6 showed that Vice Premier He Lifeng has been appointed director of the Central Financial Office and the Central Financial Working Committee. Secretary, Wang Jiang serves as deputy director of the Central Financial Office in charge of daily work and deputy secretary of the Central Financial Working Committee in charge of daily work. Xia Xiande serves as deputy director of the Central Financial Office, and Qin Bin serves as deputy secretary of the Central Financial Working Committee.

;

;Wang Jiang once served as Secretary of the Party Committee of China Everbright Group Co., Ltd. Xia Xiande previously served as a member of the Party Leadership Group and Deputy Minister of the Ministry of Finance. Qin Bin previously served as leader of the Central Committee's Seventh Inspection Team.

;

;;[The new "head" of the Huaihe Water Conservancy Commission takes office];

;

;A few days ago, the Huaihe River Water Conservancy Committee of the Ministry of Water Resources held a cadre meeting and announced the decision of the Party Committee of the Ministry of Water Resources on the appointment of the main responsible comrades of the Huaihe Committee. Yang Feng was appointed as the secretary and director of the Huaihe Committee Party Committee.

;

;Public information shows that Yang Feng was born in January 1971 in Hangzhou, Zhejiang. He once served as deputy director and director of the Planning and Planning Department of the Huaihe Committee of the Ministry of Water Resources. In November 2020, he was appointed as deputy director and member of the Party Leadership Group of the Huaihe Committee. This is his new post.

;

;The Huaihe Commission is a public institution directly under the Ministry of Water Resources. It is a full-time agency for comprehensive planning, management and development, unified dispatch and project management of water resources in the Huaihe River Basin. It is headquartered in Anhui Province Bengbu.

;

;;Anti-Corruption Chronicle;

;

;;[ICBC The former vice president was dismissed];

;

;The website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the State Supervision Commission reported on November 4, 2023 that Zhang Hongli, the former vice president of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, was suspected of He has seriously violated discipline and law and is currently undergoing disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.

;

;Zhang Hongli, born in January 1965, received a master's degree in genetics from Canada and a master's degree in business administration from the United States. He has worked in foreign banks for nearly 20 years. He has successively served as director and head of China business of Schroders International Merchant Bank in the UK, member of the Global Management Committee of Deutsche Bank Global Bank, and president of the Asia-Pacific region.

;

;In 2010, Zhang Hongli became the vice president of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, becoming the highest-level executive introduced by the mainland from a foreign bank at that time. He resigned in 2018 "due to family reasons" .

;

;;[The former deputy general manager of COFCO Group was investigated, and he was deeply involved in the real estate field];

;

;On the afternoon of November 8, the website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission announced that Zhou Zheng, the former party member and deputy general manager of COFCO Group Co., Ltd., is suspected of serious violations of discipline and law and is currently undergoing disciplinary review and review by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission. Supervise investigations.

;

;Zhou Zhengsheng was born in March 1963. He worked in the 609th Research Institute of the Ministry of Aeronautics and Astronautics in his early years. Later, he worked in COFCO Group for a long time and successively served as COFCO Southern Packaging Co., Ltd. General manager, deputy general manager of COFCO Development Co., Ltd., etc.

;

;From June 2008 to December 2010, Zhou Zheng served as the general manager of COFCO Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd., and in December 2010, he served as the general manager of COFCO Real Estate (Group) Co., Ltd. Co., Ltd. Chairman. In January 2012, he was appointed as Vice President of COFCO Corporation. In February 2013, he was appointed as Chairman of the Board and Executive Director of Joy City Real Estate Co., Ltd.. In December 2013, he was appointed as a member of the Party Leadership Group of COFCO Corporation. In March 2021, Zhou Zheng resigned from his position in Joy City.

;

;;[Hunan Yiyang Discipline Inspection Commission severely criticized 7 people for "hard to get rid of alcohol addiction"];

;

;On November 9, the website of the Yiyang Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision announced that the Yiyang Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision had conducted an in-depth review of clues to the drunk driving problem of Luo Junwei, a former party member and deputy director of the Municipal Justice Bureau, and seriously investigated and punished 7 leaders. The problem of cadres eating and drinking illegally.

;

;From February 26 to March 3, 2023, the Yiyang Municipal Party Committee held the fourth seminar for municipal cadres to study and implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. . Luo Junwei illegally organized Lian Shihong, executive deputy director of the Datong Lake District Management Committee, Meng Xiangsheng, deputy director of the Nanxian People's Congress Standing Committee, Zhang Hongjun, deputy director of the Nanxian People's Congress Standing Committee, Chen Guoqi, deputy director of the Nanxian People's Congress Standing Committee, who participated in the training at the same time, and Nanxian CPPCC Seven people, including Vice Chairman Wang Jinhui and Xie Jianjun, deputy chairman of the Agriculture Committee of the Municipal People's Congress who did not participate in the training, had dinner together in the canteen of a private enterprise in Yiyang High-tech Zone.

;

;;Ministry information;

;

;;[Ministry of Civil Affairs: Encourage qualified areas to develop standards for wedding customs and etiquette based on local conditions];

;

;From November 1 to 3, 2023, the Ministry of Civil Affairs held a national wedding custom reform meeting in Zhoushan, Zhejiang and the promotion meeting for the “inter-provincial universal application” of marriage registration. The meeting encouraged exploration of linking marriage registration with public welfare undertakings, and actively held distinctive collective weddings, charity weddings, green weddings, etc. Encourage qualified regions to develop standards for wedding customs and etiquette based on local conditions, and increase advocacy and promotion efforts.

;

;;[Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security: Resolutely prevent and resolve major risks such as large-scale unemployment];

;

;Xinhua News Agency reported on November 6 that Wang Xiaoping, Minister of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, said in an interview that the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security will make every effort to strengthen employment monitoring and early warning. We should pay attention to ensuring basic security, improve the employment support system for key groups, and strive to promote the employment of key groups such as young people, especially college graduates, rural laborers, especially people who have escaped poverty, and people who have difficulty finding jobs, so as to effectively ensure the bottom line of people's livelihood. We must resolutely prevent and resolve major risks such as large-scale unemployment and ensure the overall stability of the employment situation.

;

;;[Emergency Management Department: 20 assessment inspection teams enter various provinces];

;

;The website of the Ministry of Emergency Management reported on November 7 that the State Council's 2023 provincial government safety production and fire protection work assessment inspections were officially launched. Twenty assessment and inspection teams led by ministerial-level leaders of relevant member units of the State Council Safety Committee have successively stationed in 31 provincial governments and the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps to conduct assessment and inspections of production safety and fire protection in 2023.

;

;;Rule of Law Broadcast;

;

;;[Issued by the Supreme People’s Procuratorate Guiding cases on parole supervision, clarifying the rules of legal application];

;

;News from the Supreme People's Procuratorate on November 6, 2023, the Supreme People's Procuratorate used "parole supervision" The 49th batch of guiding cases were released on the theme. This is also the first batch of guiding cases on parole supervision issued by the Supreme People's Procuratorate.

;

;;["Evidence Guidelines for Handling Criminal Cases involving Sand at Sea" issued];

;

;Supreme People's Procuratorate website reported on November 7 that recently, the General Office of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, the General Office of the Ministry of Public Security, and the Law Enforcement Department of the China Coast Guard jointly issued the "Evidence Guidelines for Handling Maritime Sand-Involved Criminal Cases." The "Guidelines" respectively stipulate the evidence that needs to be collected in these two types of maritime criminal cases involving sand from five aspects: the subject of the crime, the subjective aspect of the crime, the object of the crime, the objective aspect of the crime, and the sentencing circumstances, and provide directions for the review and handling of such cases.

;

;;[Ministry of Public Security: The crime of fake seals and false evidence presents three new characteristics];

;

;On November 9, the Ministry of Public Security held a press conference with the theme of "Public Security and Safeguarding the Party in the New Journey" in Beijing. Chen Shiqu, deputy director of the Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security, informed at the press conference that since 2023, the National People’s Congress More than 7,700 criminal cases of fake seals and certificates were investigated, 11,000 suspects were arrested, and more than 12 million pieces (copies) of various types of fake seals and certificates were confiscated. This type of crime presents new characteristics such as the industrialization of criminal chains, diversification of counterfeiting types, and networked sales channels. Public security agencies across the country will continue to maintain a high-pressure and crackdown posture.

;

;;[Supreme Law: Owners who have not agreed to install an elevator have the right to use the elevator after paying additional capital];

;

;On November 8, the Supreme People's Court held a press conference on typical cases of installing elevators in existing residential buildings in old communities. The relevant person in charge of the Supreme People's Court stated that owners who have not agreed to install an elevator have the right to use the elevator after paying back the capital. If other owners believe that the obstruction of the elevator installation has caused losses to them, they can claim their rights in another case, but this cannot be used to refuse the owner's payment. Use the elevator after collecting the funds.

;

;;Local political situation;

;

;;[Inner Mongolia: Will Actively apply for the establishment of China (Inner Mongolia) Free Trade Pilot Zone];

;

;On November 9, 2023, at a press conference held by the State Council Information Office Zheng Hongfan, member of the Standing Committee of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Party Committee and Minister of the Propaganda Department, said that Inner Mongolia will actively apply for the establishment of the China (Inner Mongolia) Free Trade Pilot Zone, enhance platform functions such as mutual trade zones and comprehensive bonded zones, and deepen cooperation with Mongolia and Russia in agriculture, animal husbandry, energy and minerals Cooperation in areas such as infrastructure, ecology and environmental protection.

;

;;[Hebei: Xiongan New District promises outstanding fresh graduates to receive 1,000 yuan per month within 5 years of joining the job];

;

;On the morning of November 7, Xiongan New Area launched 16 policies and measures for the introduction of various types of talents and rewards for the implementation of major platforms at a press conference on policies and measures to create an innovation highland and a hot spot for entrepreneurship to gather new talents. policy measures. Outstanding fresh graduates from colleges and universities who come to Xiongan to take the job application examination stay at the "Talent Station" for free; within 5 years after joining the job, monthly living allowances of 3,000 yuan for doctoral students, 2,000 yuan for master's students, and 1,000 yuan for undergraduate students are provided to allow talents to stay in Xiongan Live and work in peace and contentment.

;

;;[Guangdong: Guangzhou plans to implement a cumulative points system for electric bicycles];

; Fri, 10 Nov 2023 18:25:03 +0800 贩卖假出生医学证明：“洗白”被拐儿童是黑产重要一环丨快评http://www.infzm.com/contents/260341
;;2023-11-10 17:00:00;
;

;Recently, anti-trafficking volunteer Shangguan Zhengyi reported that the director of Jianqiao Hospital in Xiangyang, Hubei Province was selling birth certificates, which caused great concern . In response, the Xiangyang Municipal Health Commission reported that the obstetrics and gynecology department of the hospital involved has been suspended for rectification, and the hospital director has been subject to criminal coercive measures and is under investigation. According to the latest news, the Xiangyang Municipal Public Security Bureau has upgraded the investigation of this case, and has initially verified the criminal facts of 5 cases of buying and selling birth certificates, and is further digging into other accusations such as baby trafficking.

;

;A medical birth certificate is a certificate issued by a medical institution for a newborn, including the newborn’s name, gender, date of birth, parents’ information, etc. This birth certificate, known as the "first certificate in life", can play a role in proving the parent-child relationship during the subsequent settlement process.

;

;Therefore, fake medical birth certificates have become a very important link in the entire child trafficking industry chain. Using the information of the briber as the parents and creating a fake birth medical certificate, the abducted children can openly register as the briber's biological children at the police station and "cleanse" them. As a long-term anti-trafficking volunteer, Shangguan Zhengyi has encountered the other party many times during anti-trafficking operations to produce a "medical birth certificate" to prove that the child is his own. It was precisely because of this that he began to pay attention to and report the issue of falsification of medical birth certificates.

;

;The last time Shangguan Zhengyi attracted widespread attention was when he reported that nearly 5,000 stolen medical birth certificates from Shangqiu Maternal and Child Health Hospital in Henan were used for child trafficking. In 2016, during his anti-trafficking investigation, he discovered that someone in Fujian purchased a child and then registered it with an illegally obtained birth certificate. Some of the birth medical certificates came from Shangqiu Maternal and Child Health Hospital. Shangqiu Maternal and Child Health Hospital stated that as early as 2011, it discovered that a large number of medical birth certificates had been stolen. At that time, it reported to the police and published a newspaper statement stating that they were invalid. In 2012, it was discovered that a batch of birth certificates had been stolen twice, totaling 4,885 copies. The Shangqiu police stepped up their investigation and eventually found out that the theft was committed by insiders. The then section chief and deputy section chief of Shangqiu Maternal and Child Health Hospital who were responsible for managing birth medical certificates were all captured and sentenced.

;

;Shangqiu Maternal and Child Health Hospital is not the only place where medical birth certificates have been stolen and used for illegal activities. This case is only more interesting because of the sheer number of stolen items. It is worth noting that these stolen medical birth certificates were declared invalid in newspapers. Therefore, strictly speaking, the certificates produced from these stolen certificates are invalid and false. However, because the database of the medical system is not connected with the public security department, it is difficult for the police station to verify the authenticity of the medical birth certificate when registering a newborn baby (in fact, the medical birth certificate does not use any high-end anti-counterfeiting technology). In addition, some police stations do not conduct strict inspections, so some completely forged birth certificates can be used to register for household registration, not to mention these "fake certificates" made from stolen "real certificates".

;

;The case of selling medical birth certificates at Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital goes a step further. The fake certificate they forged was not just a fake certificate, but a complete record in the health department's system. From the time of pregnancy to the hospital filing, all the way to the subsequent prenatal check-up and delivery, everything is recorded in the health system. The birth medical certificate and vaccination certificate are also available in the system. In other words, if you only look at the superficial documents, then this is so true that it cannot be truly “true proof”. Even if the police station gets the certificate from the health system to check its authenticity, it can only conclude that it is a genuine certificate.

;

;Therefore, Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital and its director Ye Youzhi are undoubtedly accomplices of child trafficking and have committed serious crimes. At present, some of the facts of his illegal sale of birth medical certificates have been verified, which has violated the crime of buying and selling official documents and documents of state agencies. But this is only a misdemeanor. The more serious charge is that if Ye Youzhi knew that the baby was abducted and issued a false birth medical certificate for him, he might be found to be an accomplice in child abduction. The minimum penalty for child abduction and trafficking is 5 years in prison, and in serious cases, the death penalty. Ye Youzhi once claimed that she "committed a capital crime", which shows that it is very likely that she knew that the fake birth certificates issued were used on abducted children. How many fake birth certificates did she sell, and how many abducted children were "laundered" among them? It remains for the police to further investigate and follow the clues to uncover more criminals.

;

;Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital and Ye Youzhi are not the only ones who forged medical birth certificates. As early as 2019, CCTV reported a case of forging medical birth certificates at a private hospital in Shehong, Sichuan. The method was exactly the same as that of Jianqiao Hospital. This time, Shangguan Zhengyi also reported hospitals in Nanning, Guangxi and other places. There are also more agents selling fake birth certificates active on the Internet.

;

;This black industrial chain that operates as a harbinger of evil must be severely cracked down on.

; Fri, 10 Nov 2023 17:25:03 +0800 襄阳健桥医院“贩卖出生证明”事件：7人已被采取刑事强制措施http://www.infzm.com/contents/260305
;;2023-11-10 16:00:00;
;

;A hospital in Xiangyang City, Hubei Province was recently reported to have "colluded with intermediary gangs in many places to sell birth medical certificates", causing social concern focus on.

;

;The birth medical certificate is a statutory medical certification document stipulated in the "Maternal and Infant Health Care Law of the People's Republic of China" and is an important basis for birth registration by the household registration authority. The national health authorities have repeatedly emphasized the need to strengthen the management of medical birth certificates. Under strict regulations, why is the birth certificate "lost" here? "Xinhua Viewpoint" reporters conducted an investigation.

;

;;The obstetrics and gynecology department of the hospital involved has been closed for rectification;

;

;On November 7, the reporter came to the hospital involved - located in Xiangcheng District, Xiangyang City, Hubei Province Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital. Walking into the lobby, the reporter saw that the hospital was operating normally, with banners hanging in conspicuous positions. Looking at the floor signs, in addition to the various departments of the hospital, there is also a confinement center in the building.

;

;;;

;;The picture shows the lobby on the first floor of Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital taken on November 7. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Hou Wenkun;

;

;On November 6, anti-trafficking volunteer Shangguan Zhengyi (screen name) posted on social platforms that after more than a year of unannounced visits, he discovered that Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital Dean Ye Moumou colluded with intermediary gangs in many places, used social platforms to publicly publish birth certificate information, scouted for customers, and sold birth medical certificates and vaccination books. According to Shangguan Zhengyi's understanding, the medical birth certificates sold are "authentic and verifiable", and some are for abducted children, some for surrogate children, and some for abandoned babies.

;

;The reporter learned from the interview that the Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital involved was formerly known as Xiangyang 102 Hospital. In 2011, the hospital was transformed into a private hospital and changed to its current name in 2017. In 2020, Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital (East District) was officially opened. The introduction at the hospital gate shows that Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital (East District) is an integrated medical and nursing hospital in Xiangyang City featuring maternal and infant care. It provides pregnancy examinations, prenatal diagnosis, nutritional guidance, psychological consultation, childbirth, confinement care, Integrated services such as baby care and early education.

;

;The reporter learned from the Xiangyang Municipal Health Commission on the 8th that the Obstetrics and Gynecology Department of Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital has been suspended for rectification, and the hospital’s authority to issue medical birth certificates has been suspended. At the same time, a professional team has been arranged to provide consultation and care for pregnant women in the hospital involved, and make every effort to ensure the health and safety of pregnant women in the hospital. So far, reporters have searched online for the hospital involved and found that the link to its official website has been unable to be found.

;

;;Seven suspects have been subject to criminal compulsory measures;

;

;A staff member of the Xiangyang Municipal Health Commission told reporters that Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital did have a child born in Qualifications for issuing medical certificates. Relevant departments will regularly inspect the issuance of medical birth certificates. However, maternal delivery and hospitalization involve multiple departments within the hospital, and usual supervision is often focused on a specific link. We did not expect that the hospital would falsify delivery and hospitalization records and other materials.

;

;;;

;;The picture shows the internal environment of Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital taken on November 7. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Hou Wenkun;

;

;The reporter learned from an interview with the Xiangyang Municipal Health Commission that Xiangyang Jianqiao Hospital has been experiencing constant disputes between doctors and patients, and the health department has punished it more frequently. However, it mainly focuses on medical services and medical safety, and does not involve the issuance of medical birth certificates.

;

;The relevant person in charge of the Xiangcheng District Branch of the Xiangyang Municipal Public Security Bureau told reporters on the 8th that starting from the evening of November 6, the public security department has been involved in the work and has completed relevant information inspection and personnel control in stages. The current focus of the work is to carry out investigation and evidence collection and verification one by one around the reporting clues, which is now being carried out in full swing. In order to improve the efficiency of investigation, the public security agencies at the two urban levels have established multi-type task forces to fully promote relevant work. Criminal coercive measures have been taken against seven suspects, including the director of the hospital involved and relevant staff.

;

;;Fill the loopholes and strengthen the "gateway" for issuance and registration of birth certificates;

;

;As early as 2009, the health department issued a notice requiring further strengthening of medical birth certificates. For standardized management, the issuing agency must implement the requirement of having dedicated personnel manage the birth medical certificate and seal respectively, and strictly enforce the issuance process. In December 2020, the national health department held a national work conference on the management of medical birth certificates, emphasizing the need to strictly manage issuance and ensure the implementation of the system. Relevant departments have issued repeated orders to strengthen education and training, and alarm bells are ringing at all times.

;

;“Trafficking medical birth certificates of newborns can launder the identities of trafficked people.” A grassroots policeman who has been engaged in “anti-trafficking” work for a long time told reporters that when investigating human trafficking cases, DNA comparison results, birth certificates, etc. Medical certificates and household registration information form the basic chain of evidence. If a trafficked person obtains a legal medical certificate of birth, he or she can legally apply for household registration. It is difficult to form sufficient evidence based on DNA comparison results alone, which will bring serious challenges to case investigation.

;

;Pan Yu, a partner at Hubei Yingchu Law Firm, pointed out that the birth medical certificate is a legal medical certificate used to prove the identity of the baby. It is a national agency document uniformly printed by relevant national departments and issued by the hospital. The behavior of the hospital director involved is suspected of forging and buying and selling state agency documents.

;

;In this regard, some interviewees said that loopholes must be filled, relevant management systems must be improved, and the "gateway" for the issuance and registration of birth medical certificates must be tightened as soon as possible.

;

;The police handling the case from the Xiangcheng District Branch of the Xiangyang Public Security Bureau said that the task force is currently using reported clues as an entry point to speed up the investigation. If new clues or new crimes are discovered during the process, they will never let them go. , we must investigate thoroughly and never tolerate it.

; Fri, 10 Nov 2023 15:55:02 +0800 胸中剩有丘陵在，好听昭时鸣玉珂：怀念刘操南先生http://www.infzm.com/contents/260206
;;2023-11-10 15:00:00;
;

;;

;

;Liu Caonan (1917-1998), professor of the Institute of Ancient Books of Hangzhou University. ;;

;

;In our 78-level course on the history of Chinese literature, Mr. Liu Caonan has taught several lectures on the pre-Qin and Han Dynasties. He sang as soon as he opened his mouth and asked everyone to sing along. The scene was very lively. He also asked everyone to recite it in this way after class. This is my first contact with singing, and it feels very fresh.

;

;There are three articles that impressed me the most. The first is "The Book of Songs·Binfeng·Dongshan": "I went to Dongshan, melancholy and did not return. ;I; came from the east, and there was zero rain. ;I; said east and returned, < span>;I; am heartbroken." At that time, I was reading the Book of Songs, and my favorite poems were love poems, but this one was about the scene of returning from an expedition, which was very sad. The second is "Li Sao", "Tsuen is not aware of what is going on in the world", full of depression and complaints. The third is Cao Zhi's "Ode to the Goddess of Luo". I still remember the way Mr. Liu recited "In the third year of Huang Chu's reign, the capital of Yu Dynasty returned to Luochuan...". The chapters he recited all contained his life experiences and emotional resonance.

;

;Mr. Liu is from Wuxi, Jiangsu. Reciting was originally his "teaching lesson" when he was in private school. He regarded us as innocent children and diligently dedicated his treasures to us. In his later years, he enthusiastically advocated and promoted the art of classical poetry recitation. He once recorded and released "Song Poetry Recitation", which can still be heard on the Himalayas website. Therefore, when students from different classes recall Mr. Liu’s classes or lectures, the first thing they mention is singing.

;

;Poetry recitation is now on CCTV and is very fashionable, but at that time we felt it was fresh and had doubts: we should teach new knowledge in the classroom and spend such precious time teaching recitation. ,is this necessary? But Mr. Liu completely ignored the questioning glances from the audience and was immersed in his own world. He explained "Li Sao" and began to recite it as he spoke. He recited it so deeply that he was speechless and choked with tears. In addition, when he was happy in class, he would write his own old-style poems on the blackboard and sing them proudly - not wanting this to be a class on ancient literature - which some students complained about.

;

;At that time, the old gentleman in the Chinese Department, who was over 70 years old, no longer taught classes for undergraduates. Still in the first online basic class is an old man who is over sixty but not yet seventy years old. Because of this chant, Mr. Liu became the one who impressed the students the most. But among the students, there were some who admired it and some who took it as a joke. ——Everyone doesn’t respect him as much as they do other old gentlemen.

;

;I was young and ignorant at that time. I neither understood the significance of reciting poetry or comprehending its charm, nor could I understand his knowledge. Before I graduated from my undergraduate degree, I applied for graduate school. My tutors in the literature major of Yuan, Ming and Qing Dynasties were Liu Caonan and Xu Shuofang, who were applying for novels and drama respectively. Although I had put a lot of effort into novels before, I still chose Quanwu in the end. Basic drama.

;

;I listened to Mr. Liu’s class again when I was a graduate student. Each of the five tutors gave three lectures, which constituted one semester of graduate courses.

;

;Mr. Liu mentioned in class the "Almanac" and "Tianguan Shu" of "Historical Records" and "Lü Li Zhi", "Astronomical Records" and "Nine Chapters of Arithmetic" in "Han Shu". He said that when it came to calibrating astronomy, calendar and arithmetic, "we" were different from our predecessors in that we did not calibrate based on the version, but used modern mathematical methods to calculate and then make corrections (at that time, we could not say "I" more, we had to say " us” to avoid the suspicion of individualism). I was in awe when I heard it. Because this is a real "unique skill", it requires a strong foundation in modern mathematics.

;

;Later I heard that he had won the first prize in the school’s teachers’ mathematics competition (non-mathematics major group). Now Zhejiang University Press is editing and publishing "The Complete Works of Liu Caonan", which is compiled into 22 volumes and has more than 6 million words. Among them, works related to calendars include "Ancient Books and Science", "A Search for Calendar Calculations", "General Introduction to Ancient Calculations", "Celestial Calendar Theory Collection", "Interpretation of Ancient Calendar Data", etc., and "Explanation of Ancient Astronomical Calendar" (2009). Single line.

;

;;

;

;Mr. Liu Caonan has two works. ;;

;

;Most of his single papers on calendar calculation were published or broadcast during the period when he was teaching at the old Zhejiang University (1942-1952), such as "New Interpretation of "Haidao Arithmetic Classic", "Nine Chapters of Arithmetic Annotation and Correction of Zu Chong's Kaili Yuan Shu", "Annotations and Readings of "Zhou Bi Arithmetic Classic" Pythagorean Square Diagram", "Nine Number Interpretations of "Zhou Li", etc. The impact is considerable. But when we were graduate students, the above works were not published. Because this kind of work is an alternative in the Chinese Department, and no one can do it in the History Department, and there is even no journal to publish it. It can be said that there is no way out. Therefore, Mr. Liu is lonely as a master and has no one to understand and understand, so he has no choice but to enjoy himself in the classroom. He often said that I had written an article on this matter and that I had solved that problem, but the impression given to the listeners seemed to be self-promotion, because what he said was really a "book from heaven" that we did not understand at all and had no way to verify, let alone No one responded to him.

;

;At that time, he was qualified to recruit graduate students in multiple directions: pre-Qin and Han literature, ancient science and technology history, and Yuan, Ming and Qing literature and novels. However, it was difficult to recruit students from the pre-Qin and Han Dynasties, and it was impossible for anyone to study the history of science and technology in the Chinese Department, so he decided on the direction of novels. The first class he recruited was Li Mengsheng, and our current class recruited Chen Fei. After studying for three years, under the guidance of Mr. Liu, Chen Fei published a series of papers on Ming and Qing novels, making his debut in the academic world.

;

;In class, Mr. Liu also talked about novel research, but as he talked, he began to talk about his unique ideas and methods: rewriting classic novels into popular readers. At that time, he had already co-published a book "The Romance of Wu Song" with Mao Saiyun, with 250,000 words. It was based on the famous "Ten Chapters of Wu" in "Water Margin" and adapted from Hangzhou Pinghua. This book was published by Donghai Literature and Art Publishing House in 1959, with an initial printing of 60,000 copies; in 1980, Zhejiang People's Publishing House published a revised edition, with an initial printing of 150,000 copies; in 1983, Zhejiang Literature and Art Publishing House republished it, with an initial printing of 300,000 copies. No wonder Mr. Liu believes that this is a new path, and he should follow this path, one by one, and write it into a series, which not only promotes the classics, but also eliminates its dross. In his view, literary creation is the prerequisite for literary research. If you don’t understand creation, you will not be able to do research well. He lamented that he was old and encouraged everyone to attend in class. His words were full of expectations, but no one responded.

;

;;

;

;Different versions of "The Romance of Wu Song". ;(Information picture/picture);

;

;At that time, I actually didn't think so, thinking that rewriting ancient vernacular novels had no "academic content". There must be many people who have the same idea as me. It seems that Chen Fei has not followed suit. Therefore, Mr. Liu can only walk alone.

;

;I looked at the catalog of the volumes of "The Complete Works of Liu Caonan" and found that "The Romance of Wu Song", "Shui Bo Liangshan", "The Green-Faced Beast Yang Zhi" and "Zhuge Liang Comes Out of the Mountain" have been published, and they are all based on classic novels. It was written. In fact, he also had a considerable number of rough works that were not included in the collection.

;

;After the new century, I visited Japan and found that they had systematically rewritten classic classics. Only then did I truly understand the value and significance of the work advocated by Mr. Liu. It's a pity that he passed away at the end of the last century, so I can't apologize to him.

;

;Mr. Liu not only studies ancient times, but also pays attention to modern and contemporary folk arts. This "going down" approach is currently considered a "new vision" and a "growth point" for future academics. However, there was a "chain of contempt" in "university academics" at that time, and folk literature and rap Literature is at the bottom. However, Mr. Liu was not only engaged in astronomy and calendar, "Confucian classics" and popular literature, so he was unaware of this. He has always maintained a close relationship with storytellers. When we were graduate students, he invited Mr. Tang Gengliang, a famous storyteller, to give a lecture. Unexpectedly, he discovered that I was also in the photo.

;

;;

;

;Front row, from left, Liu Caonan, Tang Gengliang, Ping Huishan; back row, from left, Li Jianliang, Zhu Hongda, Huang Shizhong, Chen Fei. ;;

;

;Mr. Liu also has unique insights into the research of "A Dream of Red Mansions". He discovered the value of Chen Qitai's Tonghuafengge Commentary on "Dream of Red Mansions", wrote a series of essays to introduce it, and compiled the "Collection of Tonghuafengge's Commentary on "Dream of Red Mansions"" (1981). He also extensively collected Tanci literature and compiled it into "The Opening Collection of Tanci in A Dream of Red Mansions", which was only published after his death (2003), many of which are unique copies. However, these works have not entered the mainstream of research on "Dream of Red Mansions". He has been involved in novels, operas, and folk arts throughout his life. He can be a family, but he is not outstanding enough.

;

;;

;

;These two books bring together Mr. Liu’s research on novels and operas, but they will not be published until 2021. ;;

;

;The literature and history of Pre-Qin and Han Dynasties that Mr. Liu devoted the most to. Looking at the list of "Complete Works", the first volume is "Exploration of "The Book of Songs"", the second volume is "Textual Interpretation of Chu Ci" and "Collection of Poems", the third volume is "Collection of Historical Events of the Twelve Princes in the Spring and Autumn Period in "Historical Records"", and the fourth volume Volumes "Notes on "Gongsun Longzi"" and "Compilation and Research of Chen Hanzhang's Posthumous Works" and the fifth volume "Literature and History Series". These works are truly remarkable. However, most of them were not published during his lifetime, and only three volumes have been published so far.

;

;In addition, Mr. Liu loved poetry and ancient prose since he was a child, and he kept reciting it until his death. He said that he wrote no less than ten thousand poems in his life, but "Poems of Yi Caoxuan" (Xiling Seal Society, 2002) contains only a thousand poems. "Yicaoxuan Wencun" has not yet been published.

;

;His energy is so strong and his research fields are so broad, which really amazed me. The Zhejiang University Press introduced his life when it published the "Complete Works", saying that he "learned about Chinese and Western liberal arts, comprehensively comprehended hundreds of schools of classics and history, was good at poetry and articles, wrote prolifically, made outstanding achievements, and was famous at home and abroad." These words are not an exaggeration. . But in fact, even a graduate of this department like me lacks due respect for Mr. Liu. Not long after our graduate students enrolled, Mr. Liu was transferred to the Institute of Ancient Books, and then he recruited graduate students collectively. The previous students had all attended Mr. Liu's classes, but Fu Jie was the only one who chose Liu Caonan as his second tutor because of his work on the Book of Songs (the first tutors were all Mr. Jiang Liangfu). After graduation, he stayed at the school as Mr. Jiang's assistant. Fu Jie said that he was actually more influenced by teacher Guo Zaiyi.

;

;;

;

;Teachers and students of the Institute of Ancient Books of Hangzhou University in 1986. Mr. Liu is in the front row, second from the right. ;;

;

;In 1987, the school directly handled the retirement procedures for him without informing him, and Mr. Liu left the teaching profession he loved deeply. post.

;

;He was seventy years old and in good health. At that time, most senior liberal arts scholars of this age were still at the forefront of teaching and scientific research, but he probably had no choice but to retire because he was not qualified to be a doctoral supervisor. It seems that Hangzhou University, which has many famous scholars, did not realize his value. Chen Fei gave up the opportunity to stay at Hangzhou University when he graduated. Fu Jie left for Fudan shortly after staying at the university, so Mr. Liu did not leave any academic connections at Hangzhou University. Just before Hangzhou University was merged into Zhejiang University, Mr. Liu passed away due to illness at the age of 82.

;

;In retrospect, in class, he likes to wear a black double-breasted Tang suit or a navy blue Chinese tunic suit, with formal buttons fastened tightly. He has a dark complexion and a pair of black-rimmed glasses on his big nose. , there is always a hint of melancholy in his eyes. He sang "Li Sao" and lamented that Qu Zi was not understood, which was not a personal feeling. At the last moment of his life, he wrote "Two Laws of Writing Tests in the Wuyin Dynasty during the Illness", the second part goes:

;

;;Eighty years of stone and fire have passed, and I am deeply ashamed that my book and sword have been wasted. ;

;

;;The past events in the ancestral hall are forgotten in books, and there are many new things in the school. ;

;

;;Who said that Tianguan is not Chinese culture, but he ended up teaching Ye Shituo's tragedy. ;

;

;;There are hills left in the chest, and it is nice to hear the sound of jade ke in Zhaoshi. ;

;

;"Who said that Tianguan is not Chinese learning?" is like "a question from heaven", but no one can answer it.

;

;I checked the resume of Mr. Liu Caonan. His nickname was Zhaoxun, his nickname was Bingxian, and his later nickname was Liangxi Kuangsou. Liu Yuanchang was born on December 13, 1917 in Nanmen, Wuxi, Jiangsu. His family was well off. He entered a private school at the age of six and recited "Four Books", "Mao Shi", "Shang Shu", "Zuo Shi Chun Qiu", etc. After leaving school, he was admitted directly to middle school. He was good at both arts and sciences, and was especially good at mathematics. When he was in the third year of junior high school, he wrote a long paper "Research on Quadrilaterals", which was published in the graduation commemorative journal of the school.

;

;In 1937, he was admitted to the Department of History and Geography of Zhejiang University, but went to Shanghai for some reason. It happened that Zhijiang College of Arts and Sciences was recruiting students in Shanghai, so he applied and was admitted to the Department of Civil Engineering, where he studied. In November, the Songhu War broke out, and soon Shanghai was occupied by the Japanese army. The following year, he returned to Zhejiang University and joined the Department of History and Geography. He moved westward with the school and spent three years in Jiande, Zhejiang Province, Ji'an, Jiangxi Province, Yishan, Guangxi Province, and Zunyi, Guizhou Province. When he was in Yishan, he applied to transfer to the newly restored Department of Chinese Literature, but he still studied literature and science concurrently, including earth science, physics, calculus, three biographies of the Spring and Autumn Period, "History", "Han", Tang and Song poetry, Courses and books on text exegesis are also included in the elective exposition. He studied astronomy and calculus from Qian Baocong, poetry, literature and history from Miao Yue. He took elective courses such as He Zenglu's optics, Zhu Tinghu's earth science, Zhang Yinlin's history, etc. He studied political science with Fei Gong as his tutor, and he was fluent in both China and the West. The paper "The Moon Has Slowness and the Sun Has Waxing and Shrinking, Also Discussing Chinese and Western Calendar" written when he was in college was praised by Qian Baocong. He graduated from Zunyi in 1942 and stayed at the school to teach. He was the only teaching assistant in the department until 1947. In 1950, he concurrently served as secretary of the Academy.

;

;;

;

;Letter of appointment from Mr. Liu Caonan. ;;

;

;In 1950, the Chinese Academy of Sciences was preparing to compile the "Chinese Science History Data Series", and Zhu Kezhen, then vice president, wanted to transfer him to Beijing. , the school refused to allow it and the trip failed to take place.

;

;Ten years after he stayed in school, the old Zhejiang University’s liberal arts, science and engineering environment made him feel at home. Although wars were frequent, he himself wrote quite a lot, such as "An Examination of the Origin and Origin of "Island Arithmetic Scripture"", which discussed many differences. Qian Baocong, Li Yan, and Qiu Chongman praised his skills and methods for determining the distance between the sun and the sun. Qiu said: "This is the unfinished work of Yang Hui, Dai Zhen, and Li Huang. How can I compare it with others who play gong?" The happiest period of my life.

;

;In 1952, the departments were adjusted and transferred to Zhejiang Normal University (renamed Hangzhou University in 1958). The old astronomical and calendar research was no longer sustainable. Due to work needs, he "switched" to the study of ancient literature, mainly teaching pre-Qin and Han literature. At this time, the teaching and research of ancient literature has required combining Marxist thought to extract the essence and eliminate the dross, and oppose cumbersome textual research. This is a new test for scholars from the old era, and I think Mr. Liu also No exception.

;

;In 1964, Mr. Liu passed the evaluation of the associate professor title and reported it to the Ministry of Education, but it was suspended due to the "Four Clean-ups" and the "Cultural Revolution." The associate professor certification was restored in 1978. Promoted to professor in 1983. Retired in 1987.

;

;There is also a story in the middle. On October 27, 1964, "A classmate submitted a written opinion to the classical literature teaching and research group, criticizing Mr. Liu Caonan's teaching of ancient mythology." The reason was that on September 16, Liu Caonan lectured on the myth of "Gun and Yu's control of floods". The new counselor came to listen to the lecture. Under the background of "never forget class struggle", the matter was upgraded to "class struggle". the height of. On November 3, "Mr. Liu Caonan examined the 'erroneous' views in ancient myths previously discussed." After that, teacher Xu Shuofang came to the end on behalf of the teaching and research team. Teacher Xu gave a 25-minute speech, which not only affirmed the political sensitivity of the critics, but also supplemented the imperfections of the criticized lectures. The matter was settled. (The above is based on the article "Remembering Xu Gong in Fragments" by He Shengmo, a 1962 student in the Chinese Department). Mr. Liu's lectures seem to have failed to keep pace with the times, which is evident from this.

;

;In today's terms, Mr. Liu Caonan is actually a "science and engineering man" who has crossed over to the Chinese Department. He is good at mathematics, but fails to gauge people's hearts; he pays attention to precise details in his work, but is too realistic and does not know how to "fuzzy processing", which makes him out of place; he has little interest in people, is full of enthusiasm for things, and is often immersed in his own emotions. Among them, I don’t know what night it is.

;

;He summarized himself in his later years, saying: "After listening to the teachings of Principal Oufang (Zhu Kezhen), Zhuoru (Qian Baocong), and Yanwei (Miao Yue), I knew that in order to learn, I must learn from Bo Huiyue. . The intersection of Chinese and Western elements, the infiltration of liberal arts and science, and the consideration of textual research, theory, and lyrics. Scholars are not only erudition, interrogation, careful thinking, discernment, and sincere practice; they must also study the laws of natural science and social science in depth, develop things and accomplish things, and enrich the country. Minye." ("Preface" to the first volume of "Ancient Books and Science")

;

;This is indeed a heart-breaking argument. But how can people who work in literature, history and philosophy easily accomplish the task of "crossing over China and the West, infiltrating liberal arts and sciences" and "deeply studying the laws of natural science and social science"? With the tone set so high, listeners may think that he only tailors it for themselves to promote themselves and suppress others, so most of them will sneer in response, right?

;

;All the sages in ancient times were lonely. But are Mount Tai decadent, beams broken, and philosophers withered? Fortunately, the hills are still left, and all the relics are there. "It sounds good to hear the sound of jade ke in the Zhao Dynasty." Let future generations comment on it!

;

;For abstract artists, there is an ultimate proposition that may run through the entire career, that is: after having formed their own iconic illustrations, how to "effectively Repeat yourself”? In other words, how to use similar icons again and again but always give them new meaning, creating ever-changing combinations based on the language that you form? The answer varies from person to person. On this path, many abstract masters have left their own answers.

;

;The same problem also poses to curators. For those prolific artists who hold large-scale solo exhibitions every year, how to find new context and angles in their curatorial ideas?

;

;;

;

;

;;

;

;Ding Yi, "Signs of Crosses 2023-B3", 2023, mineral pigment, toner, charcoal, pencil, acrylic on rice paper, 350cm×720cm;(Ding Yi Studio/Photo);

;

;The exhibition itself is like a journey. Besides Ningbo Art Museum, Huamao Art Education Museum serves as the second stop of the exhibition. Echoing this kind of artistic context combing with travel as a clue. Because of his work, Ding Yi often travels around the world and maintains the habit of painting along the way. "In recent years, I have traveled to many countries and regions, and I feel that they are the birthplaces of ancient human civilization, such as Egypt and Greece. , India, Arabia, Africa, etc., have all experienced glorious and prosperous periods and are part of the world as a whole, so I incorporate these travels into my creative thinking." - These small works on paper are like graphic versions of Diary: Barcelona is the mottled brown, red and black colors on the vellum paper, Athens is the solemn temple columns on the golden coast, Istanbul is the shadowy acupuncture geometric patterns in the pure white, Cairo is the pyramids under the blazing sun, Alxa is There are layers of gold-plated Gobi yellow sand, and Osaka is filled with various shades of green... Ding Yi still uses his usual cross pattern, but his obsession with "fighting against painterliness" has long since disappeared. In fact, when facing Ding Yi's original works, what one feels is the richness of painting. Different media and techniques make this exploration more and more in-depth.

;

;;

;

;Exhibition view of Huamao Art Education Museum

;

;The migration and flow of people may be one of the biggest changes in the times in the past 30 years. This can be seen everywhere in the exhibition hall The traces of movement reflect the small history of individuals and the big history of social change: in addition to the departure and return from hometown and the relocation of studios, the footprints left by artists around the world, and even the paintings themselves have become the subject of movement. In many Below the paintings, the places where they have been exhibited around the world are recorded, as if they are also traveling.

;

;;

;

;Ding Yi, "Travel Notes", Varadero, Cuba, 2017, water-soluble colored pencils on sketchbook, 21cm×30cm;(Ding Yi Studio/Photo);

;

;A work created in 1988 marks the beginning of the "Cross" series and is also the starting point of this journey. Five years later, Ding Yi’s works participated in the 45th Venice Biennale, the First Asia-Pacific Art Triennial and the Chinese Avant-Garde Art Exhibition, officially beginning the internationalization of Chinese contemporary artists. After that, "Cross"'s footprints spread all over the world. These works traveled across the ocean, were displayed and seen, and became a carrier of cultural and memory exchanges. Ding Yi's important early works are densely marked: Berlin, Birmingham, Bilbao, Bologna, Rotterdam... It seems that this painting has acquired a deeper personality due to frequent travels. Those marked His wandering is like a medal: a veteran who has seen a lot and made great achievements in battle.

;

;;

;

;Ding Yi, "Travel Notes", Ningbo, China, 2023, water-soluble colored pencils on sketchbook, 19.5cm×27cm;( Ding Yi Studio/Picture);

;

;A time journey that aims to look back on the past has gained a spatial dimension, but the end of the journey is unknown, and the future has not yet been closed. Everything is still there. The openness continues.

; Fri, 10 Nov 2023 14:25:03 +0800 双十一前“底价”之争：头部主播陷罗生门，地方指引有待观望http://www.infzm.com/contents/260286
